doc:
Ron Vawter https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ron_Vawter 0 Ron Vawter (December 9, 1948 – April 16, 1994) was an American actor and a founding member of the experimental theater company The Wooster Group. Vawter performed in most of the group's works until his death from a heart attack in 1994 at the age of 45. Ron_Vawter ( December_9_,_1948 – April_16_,_1994 ) was an_American_actor and a_founding_member of the_experimental_theater_company The_Wooster_Group . Vawter performed in_most of the_group 's_works until his_death from a_heart_attack in 1994 at the_age of 45 .
